contents:
谢谢@懦夫斯基指路！

以下虽然不全都是护肤但是....

17 Entirely Unnecessary Beauty Products That Actually Exist
https://www.buzzfeed.com/natalyalobanova/has-beauty-gone-too-far

不要边看边喝水。看到Pubic hair dye那里我已经不行了LOL

然后有空的话大家可以了解一下Gwyneth Paltrow的Goop，很多alternative sciences & new age bullshit。比如他们卖驱吸血鬼喷雾，27美元一瓶：
https://shop.goop.com/shop/products/psychic-vampire-repellent?country=USA

使用指南：
Shake gently before each use. Spray around the aura to protect from psychic attack and emotional harm. Avoid contact with eyes. Do not ingest or inhale.  


使用前轻摇，在自己的气场周围喷洒，可以保护情感伤害和灵异攻击。不接触眼睛。不要服用或者吸入。


成分表：
Sonically tuned water, rosewater, grain alcohol, sea salt, colloidal silver, therapeutic grade oils of: rosemary, juniper and lavender; a unique and complex blend of gem elixirs, including but not limited to: black tourmaline, lapis lazuli, ruby, labradorite, bloodstone, aqua aura, black onyx, garnet, pyrite and nuummite; reiki, sound waves, moonlight, love, reiki charged crystals


居然还有爱，月光和声波！！！这是美少女战士吗？我觉得品葱可以一人一份哈哈哈哈哈，代表月亮消灭共匪。
